name: Viking Hiking
description:
Viking Hiking is a 3D Platformer featuring a buff viking called 'Bøf, son of Tøf', on a quest to reach Valhalla. Bøf carries a magic horn that he uses in an 'unconventional' way. Jump, dash and vault with the horn to overcome obstacles and explore the environment.
Are you ready to prove yourself worthy in the eyes of the gods?



Bøf can freely explore an entire island. It is up to you to decide which path to take to collect the necessary runes.
Confront numerous platforming trials and devise your own way to conquer them.
Let yourself be carried away by the beauty of this lush but challenging island!
An epic journey awaits you adventurer
